title: [1.7.10] [SSP/SMP]Hbm's Nuclear Tech——核科技 当核武器进入Minecraft?[永久更新]
author: .|°夨.忆ヽ
txt_content:
本帖最后由 .|°夨.忆ヽ 于 2015-11-27 18:07 编辑 


HbTextures 出品更新：2015/11/21 增加了检测线 火箭筒 放射性圆筒 新的枪械，食物，护甲（具体自查）添加了废弃的核电站 并修复已知bug

 
你可曾想过是否有一个 MOD结合了 普通的TNT模组的爆炸威力的模组？但现在的模组更多的只是单纯的爆炸且科技十分落后？那么这个MOD是给你的！

简介
这个Mod允许你去开采11种新矿物重现了世界历史上的著名的核武器在这里你能够用先进的仪器获得新东西，分离核素来制造核武器！你可以去探索世界，去那些废弃的城市探险！（更多图片）











这个MOD提供
- 核武器，例如美国的“小男孩” “胖子”核弹- 氢弹，例如“艾薇迈克”和沙皇炸弹- F.L.E.I.J.A，一颗很小但威力巨大的炸弹- 新的机器和熔炉，例如合金熔炉，可以用来熔炼钢铁，或者一个制造核素的气体离心机- 电（正在制作中）- 手榴弹，不同的手榴弹有不同的效果，例如碎片弹，聚集弹，火焰弹，闪光弹等- 四种不同的左轮手枪- 核废料，这些东西会剧烈爆炸（你没想过做了会有什么后果？是吗？）- 温度炸弹，冻结或燃烧一切！- 两把全新的剑- 更多！

使用方法
1.引爆核弹是一个无需用脑的事情，但一些人仍然不知道它是如何工作的,别担心2.放置一个你想要的核弹（你可以自定义核弹，所有其他炸弹都可以用红石引燃）
3.核弹只有1个方块大，你需要右键核弹来打开界面
4.回到目录，找到你要激活的东西，
5.把需要的物品放到制作槽里，如果你做到了以上的这些，一个小的原子标志将会出现
6.如果你想设置爆炸的时间，你可以用红石中继器放在核弹的主要部分上
7.当核弹已经加载了所有的项目，你就可以用红石信号引燃他，核弹就会爆炸
（PS:作者正在制作教程，物品的合成方法未知，建议使用用G键合成表）

安装
1.运行Minecraft 1.7.10 至少一次2.下载推荐的1.7.10 Minecraft forge，并运行（不难找到，百度它）3.运行新的启动配置文件至少一次，.minecraft文件夹里就会有Mods文件夹4.把本Mod放入Mods文件夹里5.享受！

更新记录
New Blocks
Det Cord
Activated by redstone or explosionsVery small explosion range
Exposive barrel
Activated by fire, explosions or bulletsBigger explosion, fire
Radioactive barrel
Activated by explosionsVery large explosionContamination effect upon destructionHurts nearby players if too close even if not activated



New Gun
Cursed Gun
Does even more damage than a golden revolverHas random chance of giving the user a shor wither effect



New food
Radioactive Cotton Candy
Gives both good and bad effects



New structure
Abandoned nuclear power plant
Containes many chests filled with uranium and plutoniumHas a small platform with many radioactive barrelsFree nuke inside the tower
Red barrels are now found in the radio station


New armor
Mask of infamyTotally not a the binding of isaac related item






Bug fixes
Powder recipes overrode nugget recipes, now you need two ingots to get two piles of powderFixed centrifuge tower recipe








Update 1.0.14 : 11/07/2015 5:02:12 am11/07/15Added the prototype
Uses fuelrods instead of specific componentsNeeds 4x Schrabidiumtrisulfide, 4x Uranium Quad Fuel Rod, 4x Quad Lead Rod, 2x Quad Neptunium RodCan be directly ignited by rightclicking it with the igniter

Schrabidium Armor and Tools
The armor will absorb any damage lower than 20 entirelyAny damage above 2 will only hurt 1-2 hearts

Added new element to the periodic table

Fixed hopper compatibility of most machines

Schrabidium Quad Rods can now be breeded into something else

All bombs are now 10 times harder to craft




Update 1.0.13 : 10/31/2015 4:08:39 am10/31/15<br data-mce-bogus="1">
Added new energy related blocks and items
Coal generator uses coal and water to generate powerBattery block can store energy and release it with a redstone inputMore efficient wire codeBattery items

Syringes
Can be crafted into antidote, which cures all potion effectsCan also be crafted into AWESOME, which ives an insane ammount of effects to the player

Bug fixes
Revolvers can now harm other playersRadio stations' doors don't break





Update to 1.0.12 : 10/19/2015 2:07:57 pm10/19/15Added deuterium extractor
Needs power, water, sulfur and empty cells in order to extract deuterium

Deuterium cells
Obtained by using the deuterium extractorCan be crafted into Ivy Mike's deuterium tank

Schrabidium apples
Come in three different tiers, crafted with either Schrabidium nuggets, ingots or blocks

New grenades
Schrabidium grenade combines the effects of all other grenadesMark VI drill grenade digs a giant hole into the ground

Flare Grenade's light has a new color





授权搬运

下载地址支持作者，请于原帖下载：点我网盘下载：点我 点我 提取码:nxk2



赠人玫瑰，手留余香-友情提醒-评分人气不会消耗自己的人气而评分金粒会消耗自己的金粒
